ygData.subject: Hi everyone
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all. A friend was creating a new eq list (there s only about 480 at the moment, heh) today and while I was scanning through them I found this one. My first
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all.

A friend was creating a new eq list (there's only about 480 at the
moment, heh) today and while I was scanning through them I found this
one.

My first thought was, "Joy! Rapture!" and I quickly subbed.

A little bit about myself:

I'm 26? Argh, where's my ginkobiloba? My birthday is later this
month, so I'll let you know definitely as soon as my grandmother
calls. Although I'm sure it's getting hard to find those little
teddy-bear cards with the wheels with the ages written on them.

Anyway...

I live in Atlanta with Ye Olde Hubby. I am a technician for
Healtheon/WebMD and I get to talk to dental receptionists all day. (I
can sense your jealousy). It's not a bad gig - I've even installed
EQ here but our network is a joke, so..

Both my hubby Chillos (it's a family name of Greek origin or so we
believe) and I play on The Rathe server. I have a 28th lvl half-elf
Ranger and a 16th lvl Dark Elf necromancer. We both belong to a
guild of really good people (well, mostly good) that a friend (who is
gay as well) introduced us to.

I've played EQ since Phase IV beta, been a guide for about 4 months
on Veeshan (aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaargh!) and have successfully
recovered from burn-out (which is why my ranger is only 28). Other
games I have played include Meridian59 (server 107) for three years
(off-and-on) and Ultima Online, although hubby has a LOT more
experiences in UO than I do.. I mostly just ran (if you could call
running with that lag running) from everyone, believing they were all
PKers.

Ummm.. what else? Should you want to know more about us, surf on
over to our website at:
http://people.atl.mediaone.net/chillicub/

Oh, and it's safe to surf while you're at work.. (nudge nudge, wink
wink)

I've read the past 20 posts or so.. am I correct in piecing together
that there is a gay guild on Rodcet-Nife? and or Nameless? As much
as I dearly love our guild on Rathe I would really love to join a gay
guild.

Guess that's about it (aren't you glad?)-
Eric

Oh, for anyone who's interested, the guild we belong to (I'm outing
myself here) is Silver Blade ... my characters are Zacharus
Anam'Matghamuin and Lucentio Duarte (mostly Lucentio)... Chillos is
Beja or Chillos (mostly Beja)
